pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President Petro Poroshenko of Ukraine | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko. 

The leaders discussed the importance of maintaining unity on sanctions on Russia and Prime Minister Trudeau reiterated Canadaâ€™s steadfast support for Ukraine. 

The leaders also discussed further strengthening the excellent cooperation that exists bilaterally, and welcomed the recent signing of the Canada Ukraine Defence Cooperation Agreement.
